alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 2:58PM AKST until December 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of two inches. Winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy snow will continue into this evening keeping visibility low at times. Winds are decreasing this evening. Snow will taper off late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
